detail_description: Noble Gourmet Restaurant is a top-tier fine dining destination situated at the luxurious Elysium Resort & Spa on the northeast coast. The executive chef, George Troumouhis, and head chef Spyros Kougios have meticulously crafted tasting menus that showcase the authentic flavors of Rhodian cuisine. Their dedication to using locally sourced ingredients has resulted in standout dishes like the pitaroudi pie with crab and mushrooms, as well as lamb kapama with marinated eggplants.
name: Noble Gourmet Restaurant
address: Elysium Resort & Spa | 5 star hotel in Rhodes, Leoforos Rodou - Kallitheas, Ammoudes 851 00, Greece

detail_description: Mavrikos is a renowned restaurant located in the charming village of Lindos, about 55 km from the center of Rhodes. Established in 1933 and currently managed by brothers Dimitris and Michalis Mavrikos, it has become a culinary institution known for its traditional Greek cuisine. The menu features dishes that highlight the freshest local produce, with an emphasis on sustainability and seasonality.
name: Mavrikos

detail_description: Marco Polo Restaurant is a popular dining spot located within the Marco Polo Mansion hotel, housed in a historic Venetian-era building. Since its opening in 2008, it has been consistently fully booked due to its efficient kitchen and service, as well as the warm hospitality of the owner. The menu features dishes such as seafood salad, oven-baked sea bream with traditional Greek fisherman's soup sauce, and grilled tagliata.
name: Marco Polo Restaurant

detail_description: Mama Sofia is a renowned restaurant in Rhodes, located in the heart of the medieval Old Town. It offers an authentic Greek atmosphere and serves homemade, fresh food along with exquisite wines. The restaurant has received great reviews for its various food options and friendly, local ambiance. As one of the oldest and most historical restaurants in Rhodes, Mama Sofia is a multi-generational family-run business that has been serving traditional Greek and Mediterranean cuisine since 1967. It also caters to vegetarian diners.
name: Mama Sofia
address: Οδός Ορφέως 28, Παλιά Πόλη, 28 Orfeos Street, Old Town, Rhodes/Rodos 851 00, Greece

detail_description: Hatzikeli is a renowned seafood restaurant located in the capital city of Rhodes, offering an upscale dining experience with a focus on Greek seafood dishes. The menu showcases the finest offerings from the Aegean Sea, featuring expertly prepared dishes that are both visually appealing and delicious. Despite its upscale ambiance, the restaurant offers reasonably priced seafood options.
name: Hatzikeli

detail_description: Stegna Kozas is a renowned seafood restaurant located on the picturesque Stegna beach in Rhodes. Established in 1932, it has become an institution beloved by locals and tourists alike. The interior is adorned with ocean-inspired decor, including shells, clay cooking pots, and hanging ornaments. Despite being busy, the friendly staff create a welcoming atmosphere. The restaurant offers stunning sea views and serves fresh fish and local specialties.
name: Stegna Kozas

detail_description: Mythos All Day Restaurant is a charming eatery located in Lindos Main Square, offering breathtaking views of the Lindos Acropolis and the glimmering harbor. The restaurant's ambiance perfectly complements its surroundings, and its dishes are made using locally sourced produce, with most ingredients coming from Mythos's own farms. The menu features imaginative salads bursting with flavor, succulent octopus, battered squid, stuffed vine leaves, and grilled halloumi with ouzo and saffron.
name: Mythos All Day Restaurant
address: main square (Next ALFA BANK, Lindos, ΡΟΔΟΣ 851 07, Greece

detail_description: Taverna Kostas is a charming family-run restaurant located in a quiet alley near the market in the old city of Rhodes. This hidden gem offers a delightful dining experience with its superb meze featuring delectable seafood dishes like squid, cuttlefish, and octopus at reasonable prices. The warm and inviting atmosphere, coupled with the friendly proprietors, makes it an ideal spot for a leisurely evening.
name: Taverna Kostas

detail_description: Kerasma is a modern restaurant in Rhodes that has gained popularity since its opening in 2010. It offers a contemporary twist on traditional Greek cuisine, creating dishes that blend local flavors with modern techniques and presentation. The chic interior design and attentive service provide a welcoming setting for an exceptional dining experience.
name: Kerasma

detail_description: Mimakos Taverna, located on the Rhodes-Lindos Highway near Lindos Golf Course, is a charming eatery in Afantou village renowned for its vibrant Greek nights. Positioned atop a hill, this restaurant offers panoramic vistas of the town and the surrounding area. Serving traditional meze and beloved homemade dishes like moussaka and zucchini fritters, Mimakos provides an authentic taste of Greece.
name: Mimakos Taverna- nunta Vula

detail_description: Nestled along the serene shores of St. Pauls Bay, Tambakio is a delightful restaurant that offers an unforgettable beachside dining experience. Once a tannery where sheep and goats were processed, this charming spot has transformed over the years into a culinary gem, owned by the same individual behind two popular summer clubs in Lindos. With its stunning views of the ancient Acropolis and sand beneath your feet, guests can savor Mediterranean flavors crafted from fresh coastal ingredients.
name: Tambakio

detail_description: Ambrosia is a charming restaurant owned by George and his wife, Litsa, who designed the menu. The cozy atmosphere of the beautifully designed room, which was originally the family home, offers a quiet oasis from the bustling streets of the village. While it lacks a roof terrace, this adds to its charm. The Mediterranean-influenced eatery offers well-balanced tastes and textures in their Greek and Mediterranean dishes.
name: Ambrosia

detail_description: Nestled right on the sandy shores of Lindos, Pallas Beach Taverna is a delightful escape from the heat and hustle of summer. With its prime location at the base of the island's hills, this charming taverna allows you to savor delicious Greek cuisine without having to trek far in sweltering temperatures.
name: Pallas Beach Taverna

detail_description: The Cesar Meze Bar is a fusion eatery located in a charming inner courtyard adorned with wooden daybeds and large striped cotton cushions. The ambiance is further enhanced by the presence of lush plants in oversized pots, lanterns hanging from thick sailing ropes, and an inviting rooftop area adjacent to a sparkling swimming pool. From here, diners can enjoy breathtaking views of Lindos and the Acropolis while surrounded by pink oleander bushes and intimate wine-covered gazebos.
name: Cesar Meze Bar

detail_description: Mageirotechneio Taverna Paraga is a charming traditional Greek cookhouse located at the entrance of Apollona village. Housed in a former clubhouse for Italian officers, it has become a popular meeting spot for locals. The restaurant prides itself on using ingredients sourced from the surrounding farmland and bakes fresh Rhodian bread daily in a wood-fired oven.
name: Mageirotechneio Taverna Paraga

detail_description: The NOR Beach House Project is a must-visit destination in Rhodes, offering an enchanting blend of dining and nightlife. With its stunning ocean views, this beach bar and restaurant serves a diverse menu that includes Japanese, European, Italian, and Mediterranean dishes—sushi being a standout favorite. Guests rave about the exceptional quality of food like shrimp salad, ceviche, and fresh fish delicacies.
name: NOR Beach House Project

detail_description: Nestled within the enchanting medieval walls of Rhodes Old Town, Alexis 4 Seasons is a charming family-run restaurant that beautifully marries historical charm with modern sophistication. This delightful dining spot offers an impressive menu that showcases traditional Greek and Mediterranean flavors, all presented with a contemporary twist. The romantic atmosphere is enhanced by a stunning rooftop terrace, where diners can soak in breathtaking views of the ancient city while enjoying their meals.
name: Alexis 4 Seasons

detail_description: GranCaffe is a highly recommended establishment for wine enthusiasts looking to indulge in a wide variety of wines, complemented by tasteful platters of cheeses and hams. They also offer other delectable options worth exploring. It is advised to allocate some time for perusing their extensive collection of wines. The cafe boasts a pleasant atmosphere, courteous service, and reasonable prices. Visitors will feel at ease knowing that the staff diligently checks vaccine certifications.
name: GranCaffe

detail_description: Nestled in the charming Tris Village, just a short drive from Rhodes Town, Ta Kioupia is a culinary gem that has garnered international acclaim. Renowned chef Michael Koumbiadis and his son Thanasis have created an enchanting dining experience since 1972, blending traditional Greek recipes with modern flair using the finest local ingredients. The rustic yet stylish ambiance of this old house sets the perfect backdrop for savoring exquisite dishes like their famous moussaka and delectable aubergine dip.
name: Ta Kioupia

detail_description: Thalassa is a delightful dining destination that perfectly caters to those seeking a light snack or a more substantial meal. Nestled in Kallithea, Greece, it offers an inviting atmosphere with exceptional service. Guests can indulge in brunch from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM, enjoy light lunches until 4:30 PM, and savor dinner from 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM.
name: Thalassa
